name: SkyFall (ALPHA)
description:
SkyFall

I have been working on this game for a long while, and this is the first publicly available version. If you find any bugs, even if you think I already know or if there are other people telling me about the same bug, still tell me.

This game is also available on my Scratch account, but the itch.io version (which is obviously this one) will be the first to receive updates and bug fixes.

Oh and also settings doesn't work yet.
